API name: NSW Office of Water Hydstra RPC API
Description: The NSW Office of Water manages an extensive water monitoring system that provides vital data such as flow levels, volume, and quality. Data is stored in the NSW's implementation of the Hydstra water database. Hydstra is a time-series data management system that provides tools for building and maintaining time-series data archives. The NSW Office of Water's water data is available through the website or via the Hydstra API.
